sources.name: DimCompany
sources.description: Current rows in DimEmployees DW table

sinks.name: sinkInactive
sinks.description: Close out the old version of the row

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		conum as string,
		coname as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*.*']) ~> codata
source(output(
		dimcompany as integer,
		conum as string,
		coname as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCompany
codata, DimCompany lookup(codata@conum == DimCompany@conum,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	desc(EndDate, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> codataWithSurrogate
codataWithDates split(isNull(dimcompany),
	disjoint: false) ~> DoesRowExist@(NewRow, CurrentRow)
DoesRowExist@CurrentRow, DimCompany exists(DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@dimcompany == DimCompany@dimcompany
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@conum == DimCompany@conum
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@coname == DimCompany@coname
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@city == DimCompany@city
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@country == DimCompany@country,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RowHasChanged
codataWithSurrogate derive(StartDate = currentTimestamp(),
		EndDate = toTimestamp("9999-12-31 23:59:59"),
		RowStatusNew = "NEW",
		RowStatusChange = "CHANGE") ~> codataWithDates
RowHasChanged alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
DoesRowExist@NewRow sink(input(
		dimcompany as integer,
		conum as string,
		coname as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		conum = DoesRowExist@NewRow@conum,
		coname = DoesRowExist@NewRow@coname,
		city = DoesRowExist@NewRow@city,
		state = DoesRowExist@NewRow@state,
		country = DoesRowExist@NewRow@country,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkNew
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		dimcompany as integer,
		conum as string,
		coname as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['dimcompany'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		dimcompany,
		EndDate = StartDate
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkInactive
RowHasChanged sink(input(
		dimcompany as integer,
		conum as string,
		coname as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		conum = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@conum,
		coname = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@coname,
		city = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@city,
		state = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@state,
		country = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@country,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkChanges

sources.name: DimProductCategory
sources.description: Current rows in DimEmployees DW table

sinks.name: sinkInactive
sinks.description: Close out the old version of the row

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	wildcardPaths:['*.*']) ~> productcat
source(output(
		ProductCategory as integer,
		name as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProductCategory
productcat, DimProductCategory lookup(productcat@Name == DimProductCategory@name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	desc(EndDate, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> productcatWithSurrogate
productcatWithDates split(isNull(ProductCategory),
	disjoint: false) ~> DoesRowExist@(NewRow, CurrentRow)
DoesRowExist@CurrentRow, DimProductCategory exists(DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductCategory == DimProductCategory@ProductCategory
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Name == DimProductCategory@name
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ParentProductCategoryID == DimProductCategory@ParentProductCategoryID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RowHasChanged
productcatWithSurrogate derive(StartDate = currentTimestamp(),
		EndDate = toTimestamp("9999-12-31 23:59:59"),
		RowStatusNew = "NEW",
		RowStatusChange = "CHANGE") ~> productcatWithDates
RowHasChanged alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
DoesRowExist@NewRow sink(input(
		ProductCategory as integer,
		name as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategory,
		name = DoesRowExist@NewRow@Name,
		ParentProductCategoryID = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ParentProductCategoryID,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkNew
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductCategory as integer,
		name as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ProductCategory'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategory,
		EndDate = StartDate
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkInactive
RowHasChanged sink(input(
		ProductCategory as integer,
		name as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategory,
		name = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Name,
		ParentProductCategoryID = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ParentProductCategoryID,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkChanges

sources.name: DimProduct
sources.description: Current rows in DimEmployees DW table

sinks.name: sinkInactive
sinks.description: Close out the old version of the row

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	wildcardPaths:['*.*']) ~> product
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProduct
product, DimProduct lookup(product@Name == DimProduct@Name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	desc(DimProduct@SellEndDate, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> productWithSurrogate
productWithDates split(isNull(product@ProductCategoryID),
	disjoint: false) ~> DoesRowExist@(NewRow, CurrentRow)
DoesRowExist@CurrentRow, DimProduct exists(DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductID == DimProduct@ProductID
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Name == DimProduct@Name
	&& DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductNumber == DimProduct@ProductNumber,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RowHasChanged
productWithSurrogate derive(StartDate = currentTimestamp(),
		EndDate = toTimestamp("9999-12-31 23:59:59"),
		RowStatusNew = "NEW",
		RowStatusChange = "CHANGE") ~> productWithDates
RowHasChanged alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
DoesRowExist@NewRow sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ProductID,
		Name = DoesRowExist@NewRow@Name,
		ProductNumber = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ProductNumber,
		Color = DoesRowExist@NewRow@Color,
		StandardCost = DoesRowExist@NewRow@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ListPrice,
		Size = DoesRowExist@NewRow@Size,
		Weight = DoesRowExist@NewRow@Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate = DoesRowExist@NewRow@SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate = DoesRowExist@NewRow@SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate = DoesRowExist@NewRow@DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbNailPhoto = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ThumbNailPhoto,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ThumbnailPhotoFileName,
		rowguid = DoesRowExist@NewRow@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = DoesRowExist@NewRow@ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkNew
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID','Name'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductID,
		Name = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Name,
		ProductNumber = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductNumber,
		Color = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Color,
		StandardCost = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ListPrice,
		Size = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Size,
		Weight = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbNailPhoto = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ThumbNailPhoto,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ThumbnailPhotoFileName,
		rowguid = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkInactive
RowHasChanged sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductNumber = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductNumber,
		Color = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Color,
		StandardCost = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ListPrice,
		Size = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Size,
		Weight = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ProductCategoryID,

		SellStartDate = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbNailPhoto = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ThumbNailPhoto,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ThumbnailPhotoFileName,
		rowguid = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = DoesRowExist@CurrentRow@ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkChanges
